text:
Producer-san,
what's this live viewing tomorrow evening?

Oh, that's right.
I'll be attending another idol's live performance.

I've got some complimentary tickets,
and watching other idols can be educational too.

If you'd like, Asahi, you can come along.
I've got multiple tickets.

Alright, let's do a little research beforehand. Knowing
some songs in advance will make it more enjoyable.

This is footage from the last live. Since then, the group
has grown, and they've powered up even more.

...Producer-san,
you seem to be having fun.

Haha,
it's exciting to study idols with Asahi.
